description.displayText:
I am delighted to write this letter of recommendation for Anne T. M. Over the past year, Anne Thomas has provided exceptional care for my son and daughter, ages 4 and 2. I am confident in her ability to offer the same level of care and attention to
others.

From the beginning, Anne T. has demonstrated remarkable reliability,
professionalism, and a genuine affection for my children. Her ability to engage with them through creative play, educational activities, and consistent routines has been truly
impressive. One of the many aspects we have loved was her willingness to get the children outdoors. Walks, trips to the playground, or an outing to an activity were a daily occurrence.

Anne T. consistently demonstrated punctuality and reliability, always arriving as scheduled and ready to engage. She frequently kept the children for date nights, occasional overnight or weekend stays, and even provided home and pet care for our
dog when we were away.

What stands out most about Anne T. is her calm and patient demeanor. She was able to handle challenging situations with grace and patience. Whether it’s managing a
tantrum or assisting with potty training, she approaches each situation with a positive attitude and effective solutions.

I have always felt at ease knowing that my children are in such capable hands. I
wholeheartedly recommend Anne T. for any babysitting position. Her dedication, kindness, and skill make her an outstanding choice for anyone seeking a dependable and caring caregiver for their children.
